page.title: 15HINCKLEY GYMNASTIC CLUB
page.content: {GYMNASTICS I go to Hinckley Gymnastics Club four times per week.I go Saturday 9.00- 12.00,Sunday 5.00-7.00, Monday 7.00- 9.00 and Wednesday 6.00-9.00. I represent Leicestershire and the East Midlands in competitions. I work four pieces of apparatus in nearly every competition. The asymmetric bars,the beam which is 10cm. wide and about 1.20m. off the ground, thefloor which is a 12m.x12m. square of mats and the vault. The gym club is well-equipped, including a foam pit over 10feet deep which is used to practise the more dangerous moves. The club is fairly new and is situated Claredon Recreation Park.
